Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 117th overall pick, by Pontiac in 1973...
Had first career hit on 5/6/1979, off Scott Jean (PIL)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/9/1980, off Rudy Plourde (WT)...
Injured on 5/19/1985 with a Spasms Back, out for 3-4 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by West Texas on 2/13/1986 to a 3-year deal worth $2,140,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Wisconsin on 2/14/1991 to a 2-year deal worth $2,500,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Malibu on 2/7/1993 to a 3-year deal worth $684,800 per year...
